idea-plugin.name: Ayu Islands
idea-plugin.description:
Ayu Mirage and Ayu Dark color palettes meet modern Islands UI â€” warm gold accents, rounded panels, and carefully tuned contrast for long coding sessions.

Features

  • Two color palettes: Ayu Mirage (blue-gray) and Ayu Dark (deep midnight)
  • Dual-variant approach: base theme for all IDEs, Islands UI variant with rounded panels for 2025.2.3+
  • Full syntax highlighting for HCL/Terraform, Go, Python, JS/TS, Markdown, YAML, JSON, and more
  • Tuned VCS colors, diff gutters, and 16-color terminal palette per variant
  • Compact mode support
  • Project color gradients in Ayu hues
